participant_1.background:
I listen to music that makes me forget about my troubles and live in the moment.
my motor never stops running.
I am proud of my ability to cook a variety of cuisines and my willingness to treat everyone with respect.
i love the rain.
I do not own a home because I would rather spend my money on Mountain Dew and pastries.

participant_2.background:
I'm not wealthy, but I am able to afford my lifestyle.
i grew up on a large farm.
My wife is a teacher and my kids are in school.
I enjoy driving my Ford truck to work as a security guard.
I want to show my siblings how to rollerblade.

content.text: Hey! What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy rollerblading, playing video games, and going for hikes. What about you?
I love to cook, listen to music, and spend time with my friends and family.
That sounds awesome! What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I listen to all sorts of music, but I especially love rock, pop, and hip-hop.
Me too! I love all kinds of music too. I grew up on a large farm, so I like listening to country music as well.
That's cool! I have never been to a farm before.
You should come visit mine sometime! I have a lot of animals, and I'm sure you'd have a lot of fun.
That sounds like a great idea! I'd love to see your animals.
Awesome! I'll send you a message later with my address.
Sounds great! I'm looking forward to it
